name: prediction
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool timeseries_prediction_model.
Tool description: Basic Machine Learning Model wich can predict all sorts of timeseries data in a daily timeframe
API description: Predict the next periods of a time series using given dates and values.

periods.description: Number of future periods to predict.

values.description: Historical values of the time series data in a comma-separated string.

dates.description: Corresponding dates of the historical values in a comma-separated string.
